column4: has anyone made a remix of gnome? .. can it be done ?  like i want to make my own flavor thats really useful and fast  but atlease a splash of color and style
look into Linux Mint's Cinnamon.  I'm pretty sure there's an ubuntu ppa
alternately, they also have MATE, a fork of 2.32
